title: Countries with highest ransomware infection rates 2017 to 2018
yAxis: Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware in the y axis.
The maximum Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware 9.57 is found at Country Thailand and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 3.22.
The difference of Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware between the highest and lowest Country is 6.35.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware 9.57 is found at Country Thailand and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 3.22.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware in the y axis.
The maximum Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware 9.57 is found at Country Thailand and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 3.22.
The difference of Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware between the highest and lowest Country is 6.35.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware for 10 number of Countrys.
The Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware is appeared to be the highest at Country Thailand and lowest at Country Turkey.
Second maximum Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware is found at Country .
There is a difference of 6.35 between the maximum Country Thailand and minimum Country Turkey.
Country Thailand is higher than any other Countrys with value 9.57, followed by , and Iran. Down to Country Turkey with the lowest value 3.22.
The highest value 9.57 at Thailand is almost 1.53 times larger than the average value 6.24.
The Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware is 62.4 if we add up values of all Countrys.
